identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a job platform that feels human, trustworthy, and efficient, avoiding generic 'Bootstrap' aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with organic warmth.
Content is King: Every pixel must serve the job seeker's clarity or the recruiter's efficiency.
Negative Space: Use 2-3x more whitespace than standard templates.
Contrast: High contrast for readability, subtle textures for depth.

heading.usage: All headings (h1-h6), hero text, major stats.

mono.usage: Job IDs, code snippets, technical skills tags.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.

primary.description: Deep Navy - Authority, Trust. Use for primary buttons, active states, sidebar backgrounds.

secondary.description: Slate 100 - Soft background for cards, secondary buttons.

accent.description: Electric Indigo - Call to actions, links, progress bars. High energy.

rules: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle noise or grain textures instead.
Dark mode is reserved for the Landing Page Hero and specific high-impact dashboard widgets.
Dashboard panels (Recruiter/Admin) should use a dark sidebar (#0F172A) with a light content area.

marketing.rules: Asymmetrical spans. Never fill 100% perfectly. Leave breathing room.

dashboard.rules: Dense. Every pixel utilized. Use h-full on children.

buttons.style: Sharp or Pill-shaped. No default rounded-md.
buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95). Hover brightness boost.

cards.marketing: Flat, 1px border, no shadow. Hover: Lift + Shadow.

navigation.dashboard: Fixed dark sidebar (Recruiter/Admin) or Top-nav (Job Seeker).

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'simple-icons' for brand logos if needed.

motion.loading: Use skeleton loaders (Shadcn) instead of spinners where possible.
rules: Do not use transition: all. Be specific (transition-colors, transition-transform).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no 'Bootstrap' look.
Dark colors must be solid, not gradients.
Use glassmorphism with backdrop-blur-md for overlays.
Do not center align the app container.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a 3-panel job platform (Admin, Recruiter, Job Seeker). Use the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' archetype. Prioritize clarity and trust. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Follow the component customization rules strictly.
